page.title: 19Vandalism in Cowdenbeath
page.content: People in Cowdenbeath are becoming worried about vandalism.There are some houses in Cowdenbeath getting vandalised.These houses are in Greenbank Drive,Hill Crest and Mossbank.The houses are being boarded up because they are to be knocked down in the future because of structural failure.Young people are going into these boarded up houses and doing damage.Tenants still living there are becoming worried that these intruders might set fire to the houses which might spread to theirs.One housewife complained that one day when she and her family returned from an outing all the windows at the back of the house had been smashed.
